ai-patthana22.1:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana22.1:2.1_0: Not knowing the teaching, the cause of the unskillful gives rise to causes.
ai-patthana22.1:2.1_1: Not knowing the unkillful causes causes and conditions for the sake of undeclared.
ai-patthana22.1:3.1_0: Not knowing the principle for the sake of skillful gives rise to causes.
ai-patthana22.1:3.1_1: No cause is a reason for the sake of unkilled causes.
ai-patthana22.1:4.1_0: No causes and conditions for the sake of skillful quality.
ai-patthana22.1:4.1_1: not for the sake of unkilled in the past.
ai-patthana22.1:5.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not for the sake of clearly.
ai-patthana22.1:5.1_1: Nor do they arise because of the skillful and the cause for the reason for this.
ai-patthana22.1:5.1_2: No to cause the reason for the sake of the unskillful and the sake of lack of learning. ...
ai-patthana22.1:7.1_0: Not knowing the principle for the sake of unskillful.
ai-patthana22.1:7.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana22.1:7.1_2: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful things.
ai-patthana22.1:8.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful.
ai-patthana22.1:8.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana22.1:8.1_2: Nor do they arise because of the skillful qualities.
ai-patthana22.1:9.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the five reasons.
ai-patthana22.1:10.1_0: not for the sake of the unskillful or for the sake of not, for the sake of causes unskillful qualities to arise because of not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana22.1:11.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not the cause or reason for the sake of skillful teaching. ...
ai-patthana22.1:12.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana22.1:13.1_0: The eighteen bases for knowing that the five destinations are not rid of existence ...
